promiseDescription: Galvanite's absorb ability turns your switch action into the ultimate defensive maneuver. Leverage this opportunistically. Knowing when to switch out with Galvanite is equally important â€“ sometimes your accumulated [NQ] can't be transformed into a benefit, so it's more advantageous to wipe them off.
